articles.description: Nifty gained nearly 1% last week, snapping a two-week losing streak, supported by the US Federal Reserve's rate pause which triggered a rise in global equities. Meanwhile, a host of analysts shared their tech views on particular stocks which may gain up to 25…
articles.content: The longer-term price action in Shilpa Medicare shows that the price is in a mark-up phase. A mark-up phase is when the price emerges from a prolonged accumulation phase and then starts to move highe… [+454 chars]
